MES_GTact2_01
勇敢ナ戦士タチノ活躍ニヨリ\n地球ハ 人類ノ手ニ 取リ戻サレタ
Dank der Heldentaten der tapferen Krieger\nhaben die Menschen wieder die Kontrolle über die Erde erlangt.
Thanks to the feats of the brave warriors,\nthe humans have regained control of the Earth.
Grâce aux exploits des courageux guerriers,\nles humains ont retrouvé le contrôle de la Terre.
Grazie al banchetto per i guerrieri coraggiosi,\ngli umani hanno riguadagnato il controllo della Terra.
Gracias a las hazañas de los valientes guerreros,\nlos humanos han recuperado el control de la Tierra.
Thanks to the feats of the brave warriors,\nthe humans have regained control of the Earth.

Thanks to the feats of the brave warriors,\nthe humans have regained control of the Earth.

MES_GTact2_02
役目ヲ終エタ コノ施設ハ\nマモナク閉鎖サレルダロウ
Diese Einrichtungen haben ihren Zweck erfüllt\nund werden bald geschlossen.
These facilities have fulfilled their duties\nand soon they shall be shut down.
Ces bâtiments ont rempli leur rôle\net ils seront bientôt fermés.
Queste strutture hanno svolto i loro compiti\ne presto verranno chiuse.
Estas instalaciones han cumplido sus deberes\ny pronto serán cerradas.
